# Prompt

![Read the Rules](/huntress_2025/Day_01/Just_A_Little_Bit/Challenge_JustALittleBit.png "Challenge Prompt")

# Solution

```
1100110110110011000011100111111101101100101100011011001101100111100011011000101
1011001110011100001110010111000101100100110011001100101100101110010101100110110
0011100101011001101110000111001011010111001000110101011100101101100110110110010
00111001011001111001101111101
```

1. Concatenate the three lines: 266 bits.
2. 266 is divisible by 7 (266 รท 7 = 38), so these are 7-bit ASCII codepoints (e.g. - one bit missing per 8-bit byte).
3. Split into 7-bit groups and convert each group to a character.

```python
bits = """11001101101100110000111001111111011011001011000110110011011001111000110110001011011001110011100001110010111000101100100110011001100101100101110010101100110110001110010101100110111000011100101101011100100011010101110010110110011011011001000111001011001111001101111101""".replace("\n","")

chars = [chr(int(bits[i:i+7],2)) for i in range(0, len(bits), 7)]
print(''.join(chars))
```

# Flag

- flag{2c33c169aebdf2ee31e3895d5966d93f}
